AIDifficultySetting.Name: MaxMissionFocusTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How long a mission waits until it forcibly hands off the baton to a new topic.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: GroupProximityRadius
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How large is the radius we use to group squads by proximity.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: RalliedDistanceSqr
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Radius squared that our groups need to be within to be considered rallied.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: ThinkCostMin
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Minimum time cost to think about something.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: ThinkCostMax
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Maximum time cost to think about something.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: ActCostMin
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Minimum time cost to do something.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: ActCostMax
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Maximum time cost to do something.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: PowerEvalIntervalMin
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Minimum time interval between evaluating powers.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: PowerEvalIntervalMax
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Maximum time interval between evaluating powers.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: EconMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 1.00 = no econ change, 0.0 means no supplies, 2.0 means double normal supplies

DataPoint.Comment: On easy, AI gets 50% normal supplies
On legendary, AI gets 133% normal supplies
On hyper-legendary, AI gets 233% normal supplies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DeathMatchMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 1.00 = normal speed, 0.0 (illegal!!) infinitely slow training/building, 2.0 means double speed

DataPoint.Comment: On easy, AI builds/trains at half speed

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DamageGivenMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 2.0 means the AI's units inflict double damage

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DamageTakenMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 2.0 means the AI's units TAKE double damage. High values are easy, low are hard.

DataPoint.Comment: On legendary, AI takes 75%% normal damage
On legendary, AI takes 40% normal damage

AIDifficultySetting.Name: LogMaxBases
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 1 at easy and near it, 5 near and at legendary, linear interpolation in between.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBaseRebuildDel
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 60 seconds at easy, 10 seconds at legendary

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseBaseLives
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Flag for using BaseLives...this could be derived in script if we use an error return in BaseLives.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: ScoutQuality_1_10
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Simple 1-10 scale for scout quality.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffForceRandom
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: False on easy, true most everywhere else.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: CntCounterCalculationRate
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: wait time between evaluating counter units

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBldMaxBids
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Maximum number of building bids allowed

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBldMaxNotApproved
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Maximum number of unapproved building bids allowed

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffDistractionTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: amount of time spent in distraction topic

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBumpBuildTopicRate
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: time ai must wait before bumping the build topic as urgent when a building is ready
